TextLibrary.Text: So when you said you wanted a present...
So when you said you wanted a present...
Pezt meant he wanted to steal something!
Pezt meant he wanted to steal something!
And when you said you wanted it for your mate...
And when you said you wanted it for your mate...
Pezt wanted to sell it for much money!
Pezt wanted to sell it for much money!
I told you, kid. Nothing but trouble... We'd better get out of here.
I told you, kid. Nothing but trouble... We'd better get out of here.
